熟悉ThreeJS框架和相关技术，具备扎实的3D图形学基础。

具备良好的沟通和团队协作能力，能够与跨部门团队合作，推动项目进展。
对元宇宙和虚拟现实领域有浓厚的兴趣和热情，愿意不断学习和探索新的技术和趋势。

jobs.job_name: 产品经理（侧重UI设计方向）
jobs.detail:
岗位职责：
1、产品方向：医药电商产品、B端企业营销产品、CDP/SCRM产品方向。负责PC/H5、APP、小程序UI设计工作以及用户体验的优化和改进，能够根据业务目标进行设计方案的产出并提炼最佳解决方案。
2、负责产品业务调研、需求分析、编写产品需求文档及原型设计文档，并组织销售部、研发部等功能相关部门进行需求确认、评估及确认研发周期，跟踪项目需求开发进度，协调项目各方推进项目进度，确保需求、功能按计划完成，组织对内功能培训、考评。
3、跟踪产品市场销售、运营过程中出现的问题或故障，并进行汇总、分析、协调、配合相关部门制定解决方案并跟踪进度，同时根据市场反馈纳入产品改进、迭代计划。
4、协助市场、售后、运维部门，解答或协调解决用户提出的产品问题及功能需求。
5、竞品分析调研，收集行业竞争对手状况，对目标市场进行分析。对市场竞争对手、竞争产品、竞争策略信息收集、整理、分析、汇总。分析市场发展变化趋势，了解行业动向。
6、收集市场、客户反馈与用户行为及需求，提升用户体验。参与用户需求分析、产品演示讲解、销售支持等工作。
7、有互联网产品理解力，能较好把握用户的需求和痛点，熟练使用产品原型设计工具，关注产品运营数据。
任职要求：
1、精通adobe creative suit系列设计软件, 如Photoshop，AI, Sketch, Axure，Dreamwaver, InDesign等平面设计及原型交互类工具软件。
2、理解UE/交互设计, 理解并知晓CSS,JavaScript, Action Script, jQuery,具有前端编程经验者优先考虑。
3、具备较好的产品需求和交互文档理解解与读能力，高效准确的进行设计输出。
4、熟知各种前端UI框架，具备成熟的设计风格把控能力。
5、有toB系统/软件（CRM、销售管理系统等）相关经验、公众号运营经验及产品岗位相关从业经验，优先录用。

岗位职责：
+ 能够进行系统功能开发，包括Web服务端开发，RestAPI，调度引擎，工作流引擎，规则引擎，BI等。
+ 能够进行数据ETL开发，包括采集，提取，清洗，加工，变形，可视化等任务。
+ 能够进行模型工程化开发，了解数据模型的建模过程，能够实现一些简单算法。
+ 能够进行Web前端开发，熟悉Vue技术。
+ 能够进行数据库设计，数据结构设计，接口设计，内存控制，计算资源管理等
+ 能够进行系统的部署Nginx/WSGI，少量运维，系统迭代优化等
+ 具有良好的沟通能力与文档书写能力，能清楚地把握与描述用户需求,有责任心
岗位要求：
+ 2年以上Python开发经验，大学本科以上学历。
+ 熟练 Python 编程功底扎实，熟悉Flask, SQLAlchemy，Pandas, Numpy等框架
+ 熟练掌握 数据结构、设计模式 等有较深刻的理解，
+ 熟悉 Vue，Http，html, js, css等前端技术
+ 熟悉 Linux基本操作，熟悉主流数据库MySQL, MongoDB, Redis等使用，了解Docker技术
+ 熟悉敏捷Scrum开发管理流程，掌握git，trello, jira, confluence 进行项目管理
+ 对新领域，有好奇心，能主动学习新知识。
加分项：
+ 掌握多种编程语言 Java，R, Nodejs
+ 掌握统计学、数据挖掘的基础知识
+ 熟悉 Hadoop的大数据技术体系
+ 熟悉云计算(阿里云，华为云, AWS, Azure)技术体系
+ 有建模项目经验，掌握 SKLearn/Tensorflow/Pytorch/Keras 等框架

● 具备良好的代码风格和编程习惯，能独立完成功能模块开发。

● 良好的问题解决能力、学习能力、自驱力及团队合作精神。

【岗位职责】
1、基于视频分析原理，负责感知系统中图像或者lidar算法相关的研发及性能提升，包括但不限于：检测、跟踪、分类、语义分割等；

2、熟练掌握深度学习及计算机视觉或Lidar相关的基本算法；
3、熟练使用python，C++，js，html，java，mysql；
4、熟悉基于CNN的图像检测、跟踪、识别等算法流程；

投简历前必读：
1、这是什么项目？
这是一家会员制以订阅付费模式的网络租书平台，我们聚焦在儿童图书领域，收入主要是用户缴纳的订阅费。
2、这个项目未来有发展吗？
阅读是生生不熄的持久需求，随着国民收入水平提高，越来越多的家庭在孩子教育上投入重金。
2017年国家对高考语文进行改革，语文提到180分，英语改为100分，因此大语文时代来临。而语文能力的增长是缓慢的过程，主要来自阅读的培养。
在这样的背景下，很多家庭重新审视语文，注重孩子的早期阅读的培养。
因此把这个需求解决好，市场会很大且生生不熄。
3、我为什么要来？
这个项目不仅有经济价值且具社会意义。
书非借不读也，每当你进入自助餐厅会吃的更好，吃的更多，借书也是一样。家长通过借阅而不是购买的方式给孩子读书，会使孩子读到更多的书，因此我们能帮助更多孩子成长。
我们一起把这件事情做好，帮助每一名儿童。少年强则国强，有我们的存在，则会使祖国更强大。
4、我们需要的人才：
1、我希望你更看中的是这个项目的愿景和使命，不是我给你开了多少钱（当然我们一分钱也不会差你的）；
2、你的技能要与我们需求匹配。如果技能不熟练，对不起，天不藏奸，很快就会被发现并走人；
3、我们需要正直、坦诚沟通、有担当的成年人，如果你不确定请绕行；
4、目前队伍刚起步，一个萝卜一个坑，每个人都做着几件事。你的工作更多的时候是独立完成，你需要面对这个挑战。
*请注意看这条：我们不招聘有吸烟嗜好的人员，包括吸电子烟和偶尔吸烟的人。
工作内容：
从0到1的开发图书租借的小程序商城，涉及支付，会员资料，订单，等全环节。
基本要求：
1、需要全栈开发工程师，可以前后端一起做的；
2、你需要熟练掌握工作内容相关的全部技能。技术包括但不限于：后端php、java、go；前端：JS、VUE、uniapp、微信小程序开发语言、开发框架、开发流程，等等；
加分项：
1、做过商城类小程序者优先考虑；
2、做过支付、押金、订单管理、库存管理者优先；

Excellent career opportunity with Ernst & Young
Ernst & Young is one of the leading global professional services organizations with 167,000 staff around the world.  We are proud of our people culture which we believe sets us apart in the profession.  Ernst & Young helps you achieve your best by providing great learning and career growth opportunities, by offering ways to help you achieve satisfaction in work and life, and by looking at each decision with a keen eye toward how it will affect you.
Job summary
We are committed to delivering independent and objective business valuation services to a range of private and public companies in various industries in Hong Kong, Mainland China and throughout Asia. By identifying critical value and risk drivers, and determining the linkages that affect performance, we help our clients improve alignment between management decision-making, resource allocation, executive compensation and enterprise performance.
Responsibilities:
You will work under Valuation and Business Modelling team, Data Analytics unit, lead by a 10+ year IT and data mining expert to conduct data analytics and due diligence in transactions (i.e. M&A)
You will mainly 
• Capture, consolidate, transform and analyze massive volume of data from structured data (e.g. finance system etc.) and unstructured data to support data analytics during due diligence and valuation work;
• Work with databases, analytical tools - such as SQL Server, SAS, SPSS, and R, to analyze data in support of due diligence and valuation work.
• Use data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Spotfire etc.) to identify of key issues and opportunities in due diligence and valuation work;
• Communicate with internal project team and/or target management to better understand client’s business, support the conclusions of data analysis and deliver customized advice to client;
• Work closely with financial diligence, tax diligence and commercial diligence teams to identify deal issues and advise solutions; and 
• Draft analytics reports and/or prepare key summary section in combined report.
You will also from time to time
• Assist in internal database and tools designing, implementing and coaching to help core VBM team in AI, work automation, digitalization etc.
• Assist in developing gadget or tools to fulfill client’s special needs during transaction.
Requirements:
• University graduates majored in Computer Science, or Math, or Engineering, or related fields with a minimum of 1 year relevant experience;
• Knowledge in data analytics and data visualization platforms, e.g. Tableau, Spotfire, PowerBI, SmartBI, etc.;
• Knowledge in programming languages e.g. R, Python, C++ etc.;
• Knowledge in database computer languages e.g. SQL, Server, Oracle, SPSS Clementine, etc.;
• Creative thinking with strong execution ability;
• Excellence in communication and client facing; and
• Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese. 
Below skills will be strong plus:
• Knowledge of Hadoop ecosystem, including HDFS, MapReduce, YARN, HBase (or MongoDB, Cassandra etc.); and 
• Knowledge of .net, jquery, javascript, AJAX, Html5.
Who we are
At Ernst & Young, we support you in achieving your unique potential wherever you are in the world - both personally and professionally. We give you stretching and rewarding experiences that keep you motivated, working in an atmosphere of integrity and teaming with some of the world's most successful companies. And while we encourage you to take personal responsibility for your career, we support you in your professional development in every way we can. You enjoy the flexibility to devote time to what matters to you, in your business and personal life. At Ernst & Young, we know it's your point of view, energy and enthusiasm that make the difference.
The right transaction can enhance an organization's growth, competitiveness and profitability. As a transaction professional at Ernst & Young, you'll help clients evaluate, structure and execute their most important deals. You'll work in a dynamic, forward looking environment, in what is currently the only integrated global transaction business worldwide. You'll have direct contact with clients and gain valuable experience across industries and geographies, learning from top minds in today's transactions arena. We'll help you achieve your potential by giving you leading professional development opportunities.

jobs.company_name: 安永华明会计师事务所
jobs.detail:
TAS – Data Analytics/Developer
 
Excellent career opportunity with Ernst & Young
Ernst & Young is one of the leading global professional services organizations with 167,000 staff around the world.  We are proud of our people culture which we believe sets us apart in the profession.  Ernst & Young helps you achieve your best by providing great learning and career growth opportunities, by offering ways to help you achieve satisfaction in work and life, and by looking at each decision with a keen eye toward how it will affect you.
 
 
Job summary
We are committed to delivering independent and objective business valuation services to a range of private and public companies in various industries in Hong Kong, Mainland China and throughout Asia. By identifying critical value and risk drivers, and determining the linkages that affect performance, we help our clients improve alignment between management decision-making, resource allocation, executive compensation and enterprise performance.
 
 
Responsibilities:
You will work under Valuation and Business Modelling team, Data Analytics unit, lead by a 10+ year IT and data mining expert to conduct data analytics and due diligence in transactions (i.e. M&A)
 
You will mainly
·      Capture, consolidate, transform and analyze massive volume of data from structured data (e.g. finance system etc.) and unstructured data to support data analytics during due diligence and valuation work;
·      Work with databases, analytical tools - such as SQL Server, SAS, SPSS, and R, to analyze data in support of due diligence and valuation work.
·      Use data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Spotfire etc.) to identify of key issues and opportunities in due diligence and valuation work;
·      Communicate with internal project team and/or target management to better understand client’s business, support the conclusions of data analysis and deliver customized advice to client;
·      Work closely with financial diligence, tax diligence and commercial diligence teams to identify deal issues and advise solutions; and
·      Draft analytics reports and/or prepare key summary section in combined report.
 
You will also from time to time
·      Assist in internal database and tools designing, implementing and coaching to help core VBM team in AI, work automation, digitalization etc.
·      Assist in developing gadget or tools to fulfill client’s special needs during transaction.
 
Requirements:
·      University graduates majored in Computer Science, or Math, or Engineering, or related fields with a minimum of 3 year relevant experience;
·      Knowledge in data analytics and data visualization platforms, e.g. Tableau, Spotfire, PowerBI, SmartBI, etc.;
·      Knowledge in programming languages e.g. R, Python, C++ etc.;
·      Knowledge in database computer languages e.g. SQL, Server, Oracle, SPSS Clementine, etc.;
·      Creative thinking with strong execution ability;
·      Excellence in communication and client facing; and
·      Good command of spoken and written English and Chinese.
 
Below skills will be strong plus:
·      Knowledge of Hadoop ecosystem, including HDFS, MapReduce, YARN, HBase (or MongoDB, Cassandra etc.); and
·      Knowledge of .net, jquery, javascript, AJAX, Html5.
 
 
Who we are
At Ernst & Young, we support you in achieving your unique potential wherever you are in the world - both personally and professionally. We give you stretching and rewarding experiences that keep you motivated, working in an atmosphere of integrity and teaming with some of the world's most successful companies. And while we encourage you to take personal responsibility for your career, we support you in your professional development in every way we can. You enjoy the flexibility to devote time to what matters to you, in your business and personal life. At Ernst & Young, we know it's your point of view, energy and enthusiasm that make the difference.
The right transaction can enhance an organization's growth, competitiveness and profitability. As a transaction professional at Ernst & Young, you'll help clients evaluate, structure and execute their most important deals. You'll work in a dynamic, forward looking environment, in what is currently the only integrated global transaction business worldwide. You'll have direct contact with clients and gain valuable experience across industries and geographies, learning from top minds in today's transactions arena. We'll help you achieve your potential by giving you leading professional development opportunities.
 
 
Best Regards，
 
--
Lucie DR Li | Senior Officer | Greater China Talent Team
 
Ernst & Young 安永
43rd Floor, Shanghai World Financial Center, 100 Century Avenue, Pudong New Area, , Shanghai, China, 200120, China
Office: +86 2122287594 | *********************
Website: http://www.ey.com

jobs.detail:
岗位名称
初级算法工程师（AI算法与应用开发方向）
岗位职责
1. AI算法研发
• 参与新产品研发项目中的核心算法设计、开发和优化工作，重点涉及强化学习、图像处理、自然语言处理（NLP）等领域；
• 探索并实现基于大语言模型（LLM）的AI应用，设计并开发相关业务场景的智能解决方案。
2. 算法性能优化
• 对算法模型进行训练、验证与优化，提升模型在具体应用场景中的表现；
• 参与算法性能测试与评估，确保模型的准确性、稳定性与效率。
3. AI应用开发
• 利用大语言模型和相关工具进行AI功能开发与集成；
• 协同软件开发团队将算法部署到云端或设备端，支持产品的实际落地。
4. 技术探索与前沿研究
• 跟踪AI领域的最新技术动态，分析适合项目需求的前沿算法与工具；
• 参与技术预研，输出技术方案并推动实现。
5. 跨部门协作
• 与产品经理、硬件工程师和云服务团队协作，明确需求并设计合适的技术实现方案；
• 提供算法开发支持及技术培训，协助解决项目中的技术难点。
任职资格
1. 学历与经验
• 本科及以上学历，计算机科学、人工智能、数学、电子工程等相关专业；
• 至少1年以上AI算法研发经验，参与过图像、文本等领域相关项目，有可穿戴医疗设备项目经验者优先。
2. 技能要求
• 熟悉AI领域常用算法及框架（如TensorFlow、PyTorch等），能够独立完成模型的训练与优化；
• 理解大语言模型（如GPT系列、BERT等）的基本原理，并能基于大语言模型开发AI应用；
• 具备一定的云服务能力，熟悉云端AI模型部署及服务（如AWS、Azure、Google Cloud等）。
3. 编程能力
• 精通Python编程，熟悉常用的AI开发工具和库（如NumPy、Pandas、OpenCV、Hugging Face等）；
• 有一定的前端或后端开发能力者优先。
4. 行业经验
• 了解医疗领域相关算法需求或有医疗设备项目经验者加分；
• 有过人体生物力学模拟仿真项目经验者优先
5. 个人特质
• 对技术充满热情，具备快速学习新技术的能力；
• 工作踏实细致，具备良好的团队协作精神和沟通能力；
• 积极主动，能够高效解决问题并承担一定的工作压力。

自动驾驶仿真岗位职责：
    1.负责设计和开发自动驾驶仿真服务（引擎、机制、工具链），搭建云平台系统框架，编写核心类包。
    2.主导或参与设计方案评审，与各团队技术人员密切协作，交付仿真系统并把控系统质量。
    3.承担自动驾驶的核心工作，向团队输出自动驾驶算法的验证及评估等核心能力。
    4.主动挖掘业务痛点，从技术侧分析和驱动业务及平台发展。
自动驾驶仿真云平台岗位要求：
    1.计算机或相关专业本科及以上学历。
    2.扎实的编程功底，熟练掌握Java/python任一编程语言，或web前端开发工作者。
    3.具备良好的编程素养，精通常见的设计模式、数据结构及算法。
    4.熟练使用常用的三方件，如：缓存、消息中间件、ES搜索引擎，熟悉主流的开发工具和CI/CD流程。熟悉Spring生态，有NIO或RPC框架开发经验者优先。有大数据开发经验者优先。
    5.熟练使用Linux操作系统、Shell脚本、K8S或docker等容器化技术，具备集群管理和资源调度经验者优先。
    6.具备大规模分布式系统开发经验者优先。具备高性能、高可用架构经验者优先。具备性能调优经验者优先。
自动驾驶仿真引擎岗位要求：
    1.计算机或相关专业本科及以上学历。
    2.熟练掌握C++/C#/python任一编程语言。
    3.具备良好的编程素养，精通常见的设计模式、数据结构及算法。
    4.熟练使用Linux/ROS操作系统，熟悉Apollo、LGSVL等开源项目研究者优先。具备worldsim、logsim开发经验者优先。具备算法开发及对接经验者优先。有控制动力学应用经验者优先。
    5.熟悉一种常见的离散事件虚拟仿真工具，如：CarSim、flexsim、CarMaker等。具备二次开发经验者优先。

平面设计
岗位职责：
1、负责网站页面的整体美工创意、设计、活动专题制作和页面的美化；
2、公司产品的美术设计，如产品各模块界面、插图、杂志封面设计、市场宣传广告品；
3、能够根据设计稿完成页面制作的优先；
4、负责公司其它美工类工作的设计与制作。     
任职要求：
1、具有美术功底和手绘能力的优先考虑；
2、创意够多，创新欲望强烈，爱设计，爱钻研，爱抠细节；
3、具有2年以上的网页设计工作经验；
4、熟练使用Photoshop、AI、firework等图片编辑软件；
5、有较强的审美能力，较强的活动专题页面设计和网页设计创意能力；
